lore.min:
&7[Lvl 1] &6Skeleton Horse
&8Combat Mount

&7Run around town on your scary, yet
&7trusty, steed!

&7Speed: &a+0.5
&7Intelligence: &a+1

&6Ridable
&7&7Right-click your summoned pet to
&7ride it!

&6Run
&7&7Increases the speed of your mount
&7by &a1.5%&7.

&6Ride Into Battle
&7&7While riding your horse, gain +&a0.4%
&a&7bow damage.


&eRight-click to add this pet to your 
&epet menu!

&6&lLEGENDARY&r
